item.title: Michael Rembis, "Writing Mad Lives in the Age of the Asylum" (Oxford UP, 2025)
item.description: An interview with Michael Rembis Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/LIT4261575335

item.title: ‘Before Sunset’ With Bill Simmons, Chris Ryan, Sean Fennessey, and Mallory Rubin
item.description: The Ringer’s Bill Simmons, Chris Ryan, Sean Fennessey, and Mallory Rubin have one day to find out if they should pod together forever after rewatching Richard Linklater’s 2004 romantic drama ‘Before Sunset.' Watch this episode on our Ringer Movies YouTube channel! Producer: Craig Horlbeck Video Producers: Jack Sanders and Chia Hao Tat Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/the-rewatchables
